name: Gold Coin of Discord
desc: Upon entering a new domain, gain Cosmic Fragments equal to 6% of the Cosmic Fragments currently in possession.
bg_desc: Not all planets opened their arms and welcomed the expansion of the Interastral Peace Corporation's commercial empire. While the cosmic map kept expanding, there were always rare exceptions that refused the IPC's beneficence. "Thank you," they stated, "but we don't need Credits. We can look after ourselves just fine." The representative of the IPC would usually shrug at these statements, then casually destroy the root of that planet's commercial system â€” it is usually based on gold.
